Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.approval

Class ApprovalProfileSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.ejb.approval.ApprovalProfileSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApprovalProfileSession, ApprovalProfileSessionLocal, ApprovalProfileSessionRemote
    public class ApprovalProfileSessionBean
extends Object
implements ApprovalProfileSessionLocal, ApprovalProfileSessionRemote
    Keeps track of the approval profiles

                              ApprovalProfile profile)
                       throws ApprovalProfileExistsException,
                              AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfileSession
        Adds an approval profile to the database.
        Specified by:
        addApprovalProfile in interface ApprovalProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        profile - the profile to be added
        Returns:
        the generated approval profile id
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - trying to add a profile with a name or id that already exists
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • renameApprovalProfile

        public void renameApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                  ApprovalProfile approvalProfile,
                                  String newName)
                           throws ApprovalProfileExistsException,
                                  ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException,
                                  AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfileSession
        Renames an approval profile
        Specified by:
        renameApprovalProfile in interface ApprovalProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        approvalProfile - the profile to rename
        newName - the new name of the approval profile
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - if a profile with name newname already exists
        ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException - if the profile to be renamed hasn't been persisted.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to rename profiles

      • cloneApprovalProfile

        public void cloneApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                 ApprovalProfile approvalProfile,
                                 String newName)

                                 ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException,
                                 AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfileSession
        Adds an approval profile with the same content as the original approval profile.
        Specified by:
        cloneApprovalProfile in interface ApprovalProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        approvalProfile - name of original approval profile
        newName - name of new approval profile
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - if a profile with newname already exists
        ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException - if a profile with orgname does not exist
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • getApprovalProfileForAction

        public ApprovalProfile getApprovalProfileForAction​(ApprovalRequestType action,
                                                   CAInfo cainfo,
                                                   CertificateProfile certProfile)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfileSessionLocal
        Returns the appropriate approval profile for the given action, where any approval profile defined in the certificate profile trumps any define in the CA
        Specified by:
        getApprovalProfileForAction in interface ApprovalProfileSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        action - an approval action
        cainfo - a CA information object
        certProfile - a certificate profile
        Returns:
        the most appropriate profile for the action, or null if none was found.
